content:
Welcome to my personal homepage!
I am a Postdoctoral Fellow at the Institute of Particle Physics (IOPP), Central China Normal University (CCNU). My research mainly focused on the experimental search of QCD Critical Point and onset of Phase transition at Relativistic Heavy Ion Collider (RHIC), Brookhaven National Laboratory (BNL), New York.
Previously, I had obtained a PhD degree at Homi Bhabha National Institute and my Master’s degree in Physics at the National Institute of Technology, Durgapur in India.
Here you can find information about my research, publications, and talks.

title: Arghya Chatterjee
